item.description:
Transformational Breathwork Group.

Session lasts about 2 hours. 30 min introductory talk and meditation. About 1-1.5 hr breathing. 15 min-to as much as needed: grounding, sharing, questions.

To read more about Transformational Breathwork please check meetup intro & board,

 


For session: wear comfortable clothes.
We have yoga mats, pillows and blankets, but feel free to bring your own.
Refrain from heavy meal 1 hour prior to breathwork.

 

 


What you may expect from session:

  • Stress reduction, centering, balance.
  • Influx of energy.
  • Powerful insights.
  • Self-healing meditative states.
  • Physical and emotional therapeutic effects.
  • Clearing and purification on physical, emotional, spiritual level
  • Clarity and resolutions about one's life purpose.
  • Sense of renewal.
  • Emerging clearer, lighter, integrated in your body.

 


10 consecutive sessions recommended
for best cumulative effect and if you want to accelerate your
personal growth and become comfortable doing breathwork
on your own. This unique, simple and accessible healing and
spiritual growth technique will become your natural lifestyle.

Please be on time. This is important. If this is your first breathwork session, and you're more than 10 minutes late, we won't be able to accommodate you, and will regretfully ask to come next time,
no exceptions.


Group session fees: suggested offering $30 for one group session.

No one is turned away, let me know if you need financial arrangements.

 

 

Feel free to
EMAIL me,
or call 617-388-7565

Loves, see you soon.
Miriam
item.how_to_find_us: Parking on a street in front of the house is fine.
item.name: Breathwork and Meditation Group
